verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>. O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Who can utter <S%H4448><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the mighty acts <S%H1369><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>? who can shew forth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all his praise <S%H8416><s%> ?
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and he that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, with the favour <S%H7522><s%> that thou bearest unto thy people <S%H5971><s%>: O visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me with thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>;

That I may see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> of thy chosen <S%H972><s%>, that I may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the gladness <S%H8057><s%> of thy nation <S%H1471><s%>, that I may glory <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8692><s%> with thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, we have committed iniquity <S%H5753><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, we have done wickedly <S%H7561><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Our fathers <S%H1><s%> understood <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not thy wonders <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; they remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy mercies <S%H2617><s%>; but provoked <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him at the sea <S%H3220><s%>, even at the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.
Nevertheless he saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them for his name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, that he might make his mighty power <S%H1369><s%> to be known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

He rebuked <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> also, and it was dried up <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: so he led <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them through the depths <S%H8415><s%>, as through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And he saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him that hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them, and redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their enemies <S%H6862><s%>: there was not one <S%H259><s%> of them left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
Then believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> they his words <S%H1697><s%>; they sang <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%>.
They soon <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8765><s%> forgat <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%>; they waited <S%H2442><s%> <S%H8765><s%> not for his counsel <S%H6098><s%>:
But lusted <S%H183><s%> <S%H8691><s%> exceedingly <S%H8378><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and tempted <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8762><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> in the desert <S%H3452><s%>.
And he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them their request <S%H7596><s%>; but sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> leanness <S%H7332><s%> into their soul <S%H5315><s%>.
They envied <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> also in the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and Aharon <S%H175><s%> the saint <S%H6918><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

The earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of Abiram <S%H48><s%>.
And a fire <S%H784><s%> was kindled <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their company <S%H5712><s%>; the flame <S%H3852><s%> burned up <S%H3857><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
They made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a calf <S%H5695><s%> in Horev <S%H2722><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> the molten image <S%H4541><s%>.
Thus they changed <S%H4171><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their glory <S%H3519><s%> into the similitude <S%H8403><s%> of an ox <S%H7794><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%>.
They forgat <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> their saviour <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, which had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;
Wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and terrible things <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Therefore he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them, had not <S%H3884><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> his chosen <S%H972><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him in the breach <S%H6556><s%>, to turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his wrath <S%H2534><s%>, lest he should destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them.
Yea, they despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, they believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not his word <S%H1697><s%>:
But murmured <S%H7279><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%>, and hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Therefore he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against them, to overthrow <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>:
To overthrow <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8687><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> also among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and to scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them in the lands <S%H776><s%>.
They joined <S%H6775><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves also unto Baalpeor <S%H1187><s%>, and ate <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>.
Thus they provoked him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with their inventions <S%H4611><s%>: and the plague <S%H4046><s%> brake in <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon them.
Then stood up <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Pinchas <S%H6372><s%>, and executed judgment <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8762><s%>: and so the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
And that was counted <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him for righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.

They angered <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him also at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife <S%H4808><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H4809><s%>, so that it went ill <S%H3415><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> for their sakes:
Because they provoked <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%>, so that he spake unadvisedly <S%H981><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with his lips <S%H8193><s%>.
They did not destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%>, concerning whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them:
But were mingled <S%H6148><s%> <S%H8691><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and learned <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their works <S%H4639><s%>.
And they served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their idols <S%H6091><s%>: which were a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto them.
Yea, they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto devils <S%H7700><s%>,

And shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, even the blood <S%H1818><s%> of their sons <S%H1121><s%> and of their daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto the idols <S%H6091><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>: and the land <S%H776><s%> was polluted <S%H2610><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>.
Thus were they defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with their own works <S%H4639><s%>, and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with their own inventions <S%H4611><s%>.

Therefore was the wrath <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against his people <S%H5971><s%>, insomuch that he abhorred <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his own inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>; and they that hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them ruled <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over them.
Their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> also oppressed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and they were brought into subjection <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%> under their hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> did he deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them; but they provoked <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with their counsel <S%H6098><s%>, and were brought low <S%H4355><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
Nevertheless he regarded <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their affliction <S%H6862><s%>, when he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their cry <S%H7440><s%>:
And he remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for them his covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and repented <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8735><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his mercies <S%H2617><s%>.
He made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them also to be pitied <S%H7356><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> all those that carried them captives <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%> us, O YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8761><s%> us from among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, and to triumph <S%H7623><s%> <S%H8692><s%> in thy praise <S%H8416><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>: and let all the people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>.
